Text.val: // Author: Juergen Paarmann
15.10.2014 SH SCR19239 Part 6: Moved test INVO_MARKCODESPEC = GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED
to INVO selection in case of BDC151.PO.LIMITC = 0 (from INVO selection if BDC151.PO.LIMITC > 0)
20.03.2014 SH SCR18789 Part6 Added test INVO_MARKCODESPEC = GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED where
INVO_MARKCODESPEC = GNRL_MARKCODLIMDENIED was already implemented
15.04.2013 GB SCR18094 Added call the BMQ005 (before Step 1: Select invoice) if SILO_TRIGGER = 5
20.04.2012 SH SCR17257 Option2:Step1/3 Changed test INVA_ACTAFACTORING > 0 into <> 0
12.04.2012 SH SCR17248 Bugfix Task "Step 3:SelectPartiallyFinInv" Removed INVO_INVDATE from DSQL
27.02.2012 SH SCR17148 Changed sort on SILO from SLIO_DEBC_NO, SILO_TRIGGER to
19.01.2012 SH SCR17039 Part 6: Added test CLNT212_BUYINSILO=Y to perform module
29.11.2011 SH SCR16880 Added part 6
23.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
08.05.2010 GB SCR15519 Added the Part5 CheckGNRL_MARKCODOTHEROLDINV
09.04.2010 SH SCR15446 Option2/Step1 Added test on
DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > 0 to select invoices
22.03.2010 GB SCR15294 Removed the StoreSILO/Part 2: check credit notes
26.02.2010 GB SCR15294 Added the StoreSILO, added SILO range
where SILO_ID <= max(SILO_ID) when max(SILO_ID) is get at program start,
creeated parent task when max(SILO_ID) is get
08.10.2009 GB SCR14968 Extended condition for the part 2
28.08.2009 SH SCR14832 Added PI.LEVEL and PO.NIHIL_CREDITLIMIT
22.04.2009 SH SCR14579 Added SILO_ID to deleted handled SILO rows
18.02.2009 GB SCR14411 Added two parameter for call GB101
20.01.2009 SH SCR14292 Changed invoice selection Step1 and step3 to DSQL
19.01.2009 SH SCR14292 Changed input paramter of BDC152
19.05.2008 SH SCR13630 Added argument BDC442.PI.MC99ONLY (value skipped)
25.02.2008 SH SCR13415 Extended argument list of BDC151 acc. to new parameters
26.06.2007 SH SCR12650 Added call of BDC143 in case of
SILO_REVIEWCONCENTRATION = Y as 3. part before part 4 Delete SILO row
12.02.2007 AK SCR12294 insert condition on client level for buying invoices
14.09..2006 SH SCR11880 Added next test to skip financing for DEBH_NO = 2
15.05.2006 SH SCR11254 Added PO.DEBCNOCLIMITand PO.NIHIL to BDC151 call
12.05.2006 SH SCR11230 Added CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = N to perform part 2
06.05.2006 SH SCR11158 Added PI.NEWINVOICEH = 0 to BDC151 call
04.05.2006 SH SCR11128 Added test to skip financing for miscellaneous debtors
05.04.2006 SH SCR10866 Extended test to perform part 2 with SILO_DEBCNO>0
20.03.2006 SH SCR10671 Added new part to check credit notes
06.01.2006 SH SCR10043 Added new paramters to argument list of BDC151
27.06.2005 SH SCR8563 Step4 Changed updated of parameter for GB101 to
PI.INVO_MARKCODESPEC_NEW = GNRL_MARKCODLIMEXCEEDED, before
INVO_MARKCODESPEC was used
21.06.2005 EE SCR#8510 Usage of GNRL/CLNT changed to read only/no cache:
12.05.2005 SH SCR8301 Option2/Step1 Added order by desc INVO_INVDATE
to selection of INVO
16.12.2004 SH SCR7549 Option 2 --> If v.TOBOOKC = 0 then further handling will
be skipped and the SILO row will be deleted.
10.08.2004 SH SCR6742 Option 2 --> mult PO.ADDITIONALFINANCE *-1 for update of
V.TOBOOKC (Part: Finance must be reduced)
04.08.2004 SH SCR5482 Added new argument PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = 'BDC150' for
call to BDC151
14.04.2004 JJ SCR5972 added SILO_TRIGGER argument to call GB101
//03-03-2004 JP request JP: change param PI.SKIP_IBHY in call to GB101 A->L
//27-02-2004 JP SCR #5482 new program BDC150
Get max(SILO_ID)
-- get miscellaneous debtor number
-- Part 4. Delete SILO (last handled SILO row)
-- Part 4. Delete SILO (previous handled SILO row)
-- Set DSQL WhereClause
... individual debtor
... legal debtor
-- Financing has to be only performed for non miscellaneous debtors and
DEBH_NO <> 2 (= "total 90 +" debtor)
BDC151 and part 1 are skipped if
(CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING = 'Y' and CLNT212_BUYINSILO = 'N')
-- Part 1: Adjust finance based on allowed finance
//Option 1: Additional finance is possible
//Option 2: Finance must be reduced
... rounding differences exists if v.TOBOOKC = 0 --> stop handling and deleted
SILO row
-- If SILO_TRIGGER = 5 (limit change) then inform the users that finance will be adjusted due to limit reduction.
-- Part 2: Check credit notes
-- Part 3: Review concentration
-- Part 5 Check GNRL_MARKCODOTHEROLDINV
-- Part 6 Check Limit denied and max. commitment exceeded <> limit exceeded
-- Part 9. Delete SILO

ExpSyntax.val: 'Factoring account will be reduced with '&Trim({0,45})&' ' & Trim(Str({0,9}*- (1),'N11.2'))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_ACTAFACTORING from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/INVA on INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_ACTAFACTORING <> 0 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > 0 where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and (INVO_MARKCODESPEC = 0 or INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :5) order by INVO_INVDATE desc for fetch only

Text.val: //Step 2: Book selected invoice

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_ACTAFACTORING from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/INVA on INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_ACTAFACTORING <> 0 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC > 0 order by INVO_INVDATE desc for fetch only

Text.val: //Step 4: Book selected invoice

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_MARKCODESPEC from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :5 for fetch only

select INVO_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_MARKCODESPEC from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and (INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :5 or INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :6) for fetch only
